title: Love, Brains, & Tech
description: George Camper is a brilliant scientist, a loving husband, and a pleasant neighbour.He always did everything the right way. He always did what was expected of him.Then his wife Milly was taken.Rising from the depths of anguish, George begins a journey fighting death itself to bring the love of his life back from the grave.Though at what cost?
author: K.R. Cox
